    Configuration for Tft models

    tft_config.Rd

    Configuration for Tft models

    Usage

    tft_config(
  batch_size = 256,
  clip_value = NULL,
  loss = "quantile_loss",
  epochs = 5,
  drop_last = FALSE,
  total_time_steps = NULL,
  num_encoder_steps = NULL,
  quantiles = list(0.5),
  training_tau = 0.3,
  virtual_batch_size = 256,
  valid_split = 0,
  learn_rate = 0.02,
  optimizer = "adam",
  lr_scheduler = NULL,
  lr_decay = 0.1,
  step_size = 30,
  checkpoint_epochs = 10,
  cat_emb_dim = 1,
  hidden_layer_size = 160,
  dropout_rate = 0.3,
  stack_size = 3,
  num_heads = 1,
  verbose = FALSE,
  device = "auto"
)

    Arguments

    batch_size

    (int) Number of examples per batch, large batch sizes are recommended. (default: 1024)

    clip_value

    If a float is given this will clip the gradient at clip_value. Pass NULL (default) to not clip.

    loss

    (character or function) Loss function for training within "quantile_loss", "pinball_loss", "rmsse_loss", "smape_loss" (default to quantile_loss)

    epochs

    (int) Number of training epochs.

    drop_last

    (bool) Whether to drop last batch if not complete during training

    total_time_steps

    (int) Size of the look-back time window + forecast horizon in steps. This is the width of Temporal fusion decoder N.

    num_encoder_steps

    (int) Size of the look-back time window in steps. This is the size of LSTM encoder.

    quantiles

    (list) list of quantiles forcasts to be used in quantile loss. (default = list(0.5)).

    training_tau

    (float) training_tau value to be used in pinball loss. (default = 0.3).

    virtual_batch_size

    (int) Size of the mini batches used for Batch Normalization (default=256)

    valid_split

    (float) The fraction of the dataset used for validation.

    learn_rate

    initial learning rate for the optimizer.

    optimizer

    the optimization method. currently only 'adam' is supported, you can also pass any torch optimizer function.

    lr_scheduler

    if NULL, (default) no learning rate decay is used. if step decays the learning rate by lr_decay every step_size epochs. It can also be a torch::lr_scheduler function that only takes the optimizer as parameter. The step method is called once per epoch.

    lr_decay

    multiplies the initial learning rate by lr_decay every step_size epochs. Unused if lr_scheduler is a torch::lr_scheduler or NULL.

    step_size

    number of epoch before modifying learning rate by lr_decay. Unused if lr_scheduler is a torch::lr_scheduler or NULL.

    checkpoint_epochs

    checkpoint model weights and architecture every checkpoint_epochs. (default is 10). This may cause large memory usage. Use 0 to disable checkpoints.

    cat_emb_dim

    (int or list) Embedding size for categorial features, broadcasted to each categorical feature, or per categorical feature when a list of the same size as the categorical features (default=1)

    hidden_layer_size

    (int)size of the Internal state layer (default=160).

    dropout_rate

    dropout rate applied to each nn block (default=0.3)

    stack_size

    (int) Number of self-attention layers to apply (default=3). Use 1 for basic TFT.

    num_heads

    (int) number of interpretable multi-attention head (default=1)

    verbose

    (bool) wether to print progress and loss values during training.

    device

    the device to use for training. cpu or cuda. The default (auto) uses cuda`` if it's available, otherwise uses cpu`.

    Value

    A named list with all hyperparameters of the TabNet implementation.

    On this page
